ABOUT US
ABOUT US
In many ways, Tropic Isles is more than just a resident-owned 55+ waterfront community. Sitting comfortably on top of almost 60 acres of incredible real estate directly on the Terra Ceia Bay, it is one of the most unique communities in Florida.
Tropic Isles features over 2.5 miles of gorgeous waterfront homes, with three enclosed harbors, direct access to both Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico, and so much more. If you had to make a list of words that adequately describe such an incredible environment, “paradise” would undoubtedly be right at the top.
At Tropic Isles Co-Op, we understand how important your lifestyle is to your long-term goals. That’s why we’ve gone out of our way to make sure that you can finally enjoy the lifestyle that you want.

lease note that any activity may be changed or cancelled at any time.

HEAD RT JS Include
End of HEAD RT JS Include
photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running
Alias: d0540e1e
Share by:
